name: Iterate: Cognitive Map
desc: After an ally target uses their Ultimate via "Brain in a Vat," they gain a Shield equal in strength to 36% of their Max HP, lasting for 2 turn(s).
enhanced_desc: After an ally target uses their Ultimate via "Brain in a Vat," they gain a Shield equal in strength to 45% of their Max HP, lasting for 3 turn(s).
